scripts.one: yarn workspace kuworking-theme-one clean && yarn workspace kuworking-theme-one develop
scripts.one-build: yarn workspace kuworking-theme-one clean && yarn workspace kuworking-theme-one build && yarn workspace kuworking-theme-one serve
scripts.two: yarn workspace kuworking-theme-two clean && yarn workspace kuworking-theme-two develop
scripts.two-build: yarn workspace kuworking-theme-two build && yarn workspace kuworking-theme-two serve
scripts.affiliate: yarn workspace kuworking-theme-affiliate clean && yarn workspace kuworking-theme-affiliate develop
scripts.affiliate-build: yarn workspace kuworking-theme-affiliate build && yarn workspace kuworking-theme-affiliate serve
scripts.three: yarn workspace kuworking-theme-three clean && yarn workspace kuworking-theme-three develop
scripts.three-build: yarn workspace kuworking-theme-three build && yarn workspace kuworking-theme-three serve
scripts.four: yarn workspace kuworking-theme-four clean && yarn workspace kuworking-theme-four develop
scripts.four-build: yarn workspace kuworking-theme-four build && yarn workspace kuworking-theme-four serve
scripts.buildc: node build_clean.js && gatsby build && gatsby serve
scripts.buildc_net: node build_clean.js && gatsby build && gatsby serve -H 192.168.1.119
